Container.Name: immich

Branch.TagDescription: Latest Immich release with an Ubuntu base.
Latest Immich release with an Ubuntu base. Machine-learning and Search with Typesense are completely removed, making it still compatible with hardware accelaration.
Latest Immich release with an Alpine base. Machine-learning and Search with Typesense are completely removed, making it a very lightweight image.

Container.Overview: Immich is a high performance self-hosted photo and video backup solution.
Container.Requires: PostgreSQL 14/15/16, Redis This container requires an external application to be run separately. You can also use a docker mods to start redis within the container, Set `DOCKER_MODS=imagegenius/mods:universal-redis`, and `REDIS_HOSTNAME` to `localhost`.
Container.Changes:
### 2023-11-08 - move to using seperate immich baseimage
### 2023-09-24 - house cleaning
### 2023-09-24 - add vars for ml workers/timeout
### 2023-07-29 - remove cuda acceleration for machine-learning
### 2023-05-23 - move to ubuntu lunar and support cuda acceleration for machine-learning
### 2023-05-22 - deprecate postgresql docker mod
### 2023-05-18 - add support for facial recognition
### 2023-05-07 - remove unused `JWT_SECRET` env
### 2023-04-13 - add variables to disable typesense and machine learning
### 2023-04-10 - fix gunicorn
### 2023-04-04 - use environment variables to set location of the photos folder
### 2023-04-09 - Cache is downloaded to the host (/config/transformers)
### 2023-04-01 - remove unused Immich environment variables
### 2023-03-21 - Add service checks
### 2023-03-05 - add typesense
### 2023-02-27 - re-enable aarch64 with pre-release torch build
### 2023-02-18 - use machine-learning with python
### 2023-02-11 - use external app block
### 2023-02-09 - Use Immich environment variables for immich services instead of hosts file
### 2023-02-09 - execute CLI with the command immich
### 2023-02-04 - shrink image
### 2023-01-26 - add unraid migration to readme
### 2023-01-26 - use find to apply chown to /app, excluding node_modules
### 2023-01-26 - enable ci testing
### 2023-01-24 - fix services starting prematurely, causing permission errors.
### 2023-01-23 - add noml image to readme and add aarch64 image to readme, make github release stable
### 2023-01-21 - BREAKING: Redis is removed. Update missing param_env_vars and opt_param_env_vars for redis and postgres
### 2023-01-02 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Contains machine learning models and typesense data

Config.Name: Path: /photos
Config.Description: Contains all the photos uploaded to Immich

Config.Name: Path: /import
Config.Description: This folder will be periodically scanned, contents will be automatically imported into Immich

Config.Name: DISABLE_MACHINE_LEARNING
Config.Description: Set to `true` to disable machine learning

Config.Name: DISABLE_TYPESENSE
Config.Description: Set to `true` to disable Typesense (disables searching completely!)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for newly created files. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
